name: Aimtastic
description: Training game for FPS games. Helps you become a better aimer. Includes a lot of different practice scenarios, which is great for warmup or taking your aim to the next level.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
